I am a Ph.D. student at the University of Alabama in Birmingham in the Department of Biomedical Engineering.

My research interests are in developing diagnostics and treatment applications in using Systems Biology and Clinomics. My current projects involves developing multi-omics integration tools and models for treatment and diagnostic of Neurofibromatosis Type 1 and it's associated cancers.

Please see my [CV](%22files/CV_SamuelBharti_Oct2023.pdf%22) for details of my academic work.
